REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Ace fighter pilot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME graduated from the Star Academy with honors and distinguished HIMself as an ace fighter pilot in three campaigns against more advanced aggressor cultures. However, after one vicious battle, HE found HIMself stranded and HIS carrier ship destroyed. With nowhere to go, HE entered HIS escape pod and prayed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Acolyte of stars
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Ever the dreamer, NAME traveled across the universe to find the thing HE felt was calling to HIM. HECAP became poorer and poorer, but used every means possible to carry on.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Aerospace engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an engineer responsible for the production of aircraft and spaceships. HECAP focused on improving production lines, and was known for HIS mastery of technical and research issues.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: AI researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a renowned researcher in artificial intelligence, robotics, and interactive holography. HISCAP friendships with the artificial minds HE created gave HIM the confidence to interact with real people, and HE soon excelled at personal communication.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Alcoholic trucker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a space trucker working for Arcknight Industries when HE killed HIS spouse and child in a crash. HISCAP body was repaired with an experimental nano-genetic therapy. Now HIS muscles continually regenerate and harden, and every movement tears the tissue anew. HECAP bears the pain in silence.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Army cook
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME joined the army as a worker and spent most of HIS time cooking and repairing. While HE was stationed on a dangerous planet, HE underwent basic shooting and survival training.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Art student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After years of practice, NAME was able to enroll into an art university and take HIS skills further. HECAP sought art industry work after graduating with good grades. HECAP made some progress with private commissions, managing to make a decent living from HIS art.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was specially trained as an operative to be used for high-risk assassinations. HISCAP skill with a rifle was unrivalled. HECAP was eventually betrayed by HIS superiors when a target found out about the hit and offered to fund their future projects. NAME swore to never trust anyone again.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: AWOL soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an infantryman. When HECAP was informed of HIS assignment to the Xennoa-Zartza War, HECAP decided HE did not want to be a soldier. HECAP was able to escape via military spacejet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Banished soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME became the most physically intimidating of the slaves, spending HIS little free time obsessively sculpting HIS body. HISCAP efforts eventually paid off when the lord offered HIM a job as a personal bodyguard. Later, when HE plotted to use HIS position to kill the lord and free the slaves, HE was discovered and barely escaped with HIS life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Battle mechanic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a tech-obsessed mercenary in an early fusion-era system. HECAP was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized HIS own equipment with original modifications.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Battlefield tech
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME had received firearms training, but HIS work was focused on technical adaption and manipulation of combat mechanoids on the battlefield. HECAP developed PTSD after narrowly escaping a primitive firebomb attack in a wheat field. The army medically discharged HIM from service.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Beast slayer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME traveled between planets, following news of animal attacks. HECAP would camp on the planet for weeks, learning about HIS prey before striking. HECAP most enjoyed hunting thrumbos. Preferring to work alone, NAME enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bloodgame survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was sold to the Corestars Entertainment Company and used as meat in one of the company's system-wide broadcast shows. HISCAP manipulative nature made HIM quite a nightmare, even to the audience. HECAP was kicked out and exiled to a planet full of deadly animals, criminals and armed camera-drones.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bounty hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a self-employed bounty hunter. HECAP spent HIS days hunting space pirates and collecting cash bounties.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bounty hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a bounty hunter on a massive glitterworld. HECAP worked sensitive assignments for extremely wealthy clients, and was known for quiet execution and total discretion.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Brigand
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME flew with a band of brigands HE called friends. HE even had a ship of HIS own - The Dung Mucker 2000.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravaneer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was the leader of a nomadic trading caravan. It was HIS duty to negotiate trade deals and ensure the safety of HIS caravan from brigands and highwaymen. HECAP became a master at managing wares, plotting routes, and striking good deals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravaneer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was the leader of a caravan. HECAP was responsible for the safety of HIS caravan and was the head negotiator in countless trade deals. HECAP and HIS people prospered, but their wealth made them a target for brigands. They often had to take up arms to fend off bandits and highwaymen.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cargo pilot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was brought up by cargo hands on a long-haul ore transport ship. HECAP perfected HIS skills at trading and manipulation of people while running weapons between systems.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Castaway
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a passenger on a routine interstellar transit. When HIS ship was destroyed, HE lived as a castaway on an uninhabited planet for several years.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Chemist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a research chemist. HECAP worked with chemicals, from pharmaceuticals to explosives, to develop new substances and treatments.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Chief engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As chief engineer on board a large spaceship, NAME was an expert in all things fiddly and complex. HECAP relied on other members of the crew for some of the basic necessities of life. HECAP and HIS ship eventually disappeared into a longsleep voyage of exploration.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Civil engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a well-known civil engineer. HISCAP job involved designing and maintaining rock fortification structures. HECAP did enough statistical analysis to keep HIS mind sharp.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Coliseum fighter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Applying the knowledge that HE gained from years around fighters, HE became a successful gladiator in the coliseum that HE once cleaned.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Colonial governor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Disillusioned by rampant government corruption, NAME ran for governor and won. However, the local gangs and their pet officials soon forced HIM out of power. HECAP left the community to return to HIS life as a marshal.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Combat engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME became a combat engineer. HE built bases, fixed guns, and repaired vehicles for the army - when HE wasn't shooting at people, that is.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Combat medic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After HIS home country entered a large-scale war, NAME was drafted into the army as a combat medic. HISCAP few years in the trenches trying to keep HIS fellow soldiers alive gave HIM an acute sense for first aid. Losing many friend has made HIM stoic and reserved.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Combat negotiator
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After escaping HIS homeworld, NAME took HIS skills to the stars. HECAP chose to operate as a hired gun, working for various rebel organizations, enslaved groups, and merchant enclaves. HISCAP specialty was negotiation in combat situations.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Computer engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Bored of HIS code-monkey office job and missing the glory days of the Academy, NAME saw a commercial about the frontier where "only the strong survive." With HIS spouse, NAME undertook a journey into the unknown.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Core world jeweler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME devoted HIS time and energy to HIS passion: trinket crafting. HECAP spent years perfecting HIS art as a jeweler, then left HIS home world to sell HIS wares across the galaxy.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Corp researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was sold to a corporation and put to work as a corporate slave doing scientific research. Unable to adapt to the social politics of HIS workplace, HE buried HIMself in HIS work and failed to progress up the corporate ladder. Every day, HE yearned to be left alone.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Corporate builder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Even as HE stewed in HIS own wasted potential, NAME found HE had a knack for moving objects quickly. It was just what the planetary mega-corps wanted in their construction divisions. Unfortunately, the monotonous work erased HIS remaining creative impulses.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cosmetic reject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Living on the streets, NAME submitted HIMself to an unethical cosmetics lab in exchange for food and shelter. After some painful cosmetic modification, NAME barely resembles HIS former self. Having been forced to work for the lab until HE was rescued, NAME is now too afraid to lash out at anyone.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Craft shaper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME locked HIMself in HIS studio for years, ordering delivery food to save time on cooking. Eventually, HIS creations brought HIM the highest honor on Semantic World: Permission to materialize any design in minutes using the most advanced technologies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Criminal kingpin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME discovered HIS gift - people did what HE said, when HE said it. Taking advantage of this, HE set off for the rimworlds planets to make a name for HIMself in the criminal underworld. Having people do things for HIM taught HIM to avoid manual labor at all costs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Criminal surgeon
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Being near many injured fellow criminals, NAME took it upon HIMself to work on them. Although many people died, HE did get better at using knives.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Discharged soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME prostituted HIMself to fund HIS drug habits. As an escape, HE joined the military and learned to fight. Too smart for the army, HE questioned and often disagreed with HIS superiors' decisions. This eventually led to HIS dishonorable discharge and left HIM with a chip on HIS shoulder.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Drug lieutenant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. HECAP had HIS men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around. HISCAP social skills kept HIM on top of the political game, and HE always had servants to cook and clean.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME found a job as a tinkering engineer on the trading hub planet Irithir. Tough local traders forced HIM to learn negotiation skills, and HE made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Engineered pilot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After HIS province was besieged by one of its neighbors, NAME volunteered for a generic modification program that created pilots for the very fighter craft that HE had helped develop. The modifications allowed HIM to pilot the ship, but also made HIM less able to focus on the people around HIM. By this time, people were calling HIM "Squirrel."

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Exotic chef
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME has always gone overboard when it comes to food. HECAP is always seeking new and exotic ingredients. HISCAP quest for ingredients has brought HIM into some close calls with local flora and fauna.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Expert handyman
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME worked as a traveling engineer. HECAP fixed things ranging from a simple communications array to the intricate software harness in HIS ship's AI meta-core. Nothing is beyond repair for HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Explorer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. HECAP hoped one day to compile a record of every animal, plant, mineral, and machine and device in known space: The Complete Traveler's Guide to the RimWorlds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fallen official
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an official for an autocratic government. When HIS superiors demanded HE participate in atrocities, NAME resigned and escape from HIS homeworld with nothing but the clothes on HIS back.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Feline scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME became a renowned scientist in the field of felines. Wanting the best for HIS animals and specializing in selective breeding, HE set out on a journey to find the perfect breeding grounds for HIS cats.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Frontier marshal
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was the marshal of HIS colony. HECAP tried to honorably uphold the law, but the corrupt local mayor killed HIS family and left HIM for dead. After regaining HIS health, NAME arrested the mayor. HECAP left HIS homeworld and started a new life working to make a difference in the universe.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Galactic sightseer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME traveled the stars. HECAP could barely scrape together travel costs doing odd-jobs on stations, but it was all worth it. Seeing the wonders of the galaxy was where HE found HIS calling. HECAP loved camping on exotic worlds and learning the patterns of strange wildlife. The wonders of the universe inspired HIM like nothing else could.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Game developer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an independent game developer. After an early success, NAME's career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Genetic engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME carried out HIS first genetic experiments on farm animals. HECAP soon grew to become quite skilled in all forms of genetic engineering. A horrifying lab accident left HIM with a mortal fear of rodents.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Genetic scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After the war HE joined a genetic engineering firm. HECAP worked on enhancements for humans and livestock. HISCAP experiences in inflicting and healing wounds were very beneficial to HIS work, but HE developed a black sense of humor. This made social gatherings awkward.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Government agent
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME worked for the government against rebel groups and excelled in this capacity. During HIS training HE was taught firearms, melee combat and medical skills. Having grown up in a war-ravaged city, dirt, blood and dead bodies don't bother HIM and HE sees no reason to clean them up.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Graphic designer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's interest in artistic expression led HIM to become a designer. HISCAP eye for detail made HIM a reasonably well-known artist on HIS planet, though HIS meticulousness often led HIM to spend too much time perfecting a single project.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hedge fund manager
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A top hedge fund manager on a teeming urbworld, NAME's portfolio grew rapidly as HE charmed clients with a sweet voice and devious intent. When the deal turned out too good to be true, HE was forced to flee the planet with a bounty on HIS head. As HE travelled the stars HE found a passion in the arts, making masterpieces fit for high society customers.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hired assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a master thief, working mostly for organized crime. Over time, HE made a name for HIMself and shifted HIS business into the paid "removal" of human threats.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Human trafficker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME stole children from their homes to sell them to interested buyers. Over time, HE lost what little moral sense HE had left.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter of the king
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was forced to protect HIS colony in the name of the king after a mysterious outbreak of murderous genetically-modified wildlife. Despite HIS best efforts, HIS kingdom was destroyed. NAME developed PTSD, a hatred of animals and a bad case of technophobia. HECAP was named for the place they found HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Information broker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME caught a ship to the next star system and began a life of travel and learning, quickly collecting a massive bank of knowledge from people of all shapes and sizes. HECAP learned to sell this knowledge for great profit, and became a powerful broker of information.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Knight
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When NAME came of age, HE was given a sword blessed by a high priest. HISCAP determination and focus in battle established HIM as a knight. Throughout HIS time, HIS stories were recounted in art and folklore. Out of humility, HE never told the stories HIMself.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Lazy programmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME independently developed software that had a competitive edge against local urbworld corporations. HISCAP legally questionable methods lead to a growing number in unsolved claims of intellectual property theft.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Lone traveler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After escaping HIS homeworld on a jury-rigged ship, NAME traveled to new worlds to experience their beauty. HECAP joined resistance groups and applied the skills HE cultivated on HIS homeworld. HECAP often warned of the nuclear horror HE saw as a child.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mech war veteran
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME fought against swarms of rogue mechanoids since HE was old enough to enlist. HECAP has bled on half a dozen worlds and has lost more than HE cares to recall. These experiences left HIM hardened, both mentally and physically.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanics engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME loved solving problems and, with HIS steady hands and a reputation for quality work, earned a job as a mechanical engineer. HECAP built and redesigned devices of all shapes and sizes. Eventually, HE was able to pick and choose HIS corporate clients. HECAP made several wealthy friends, as well as a few powerful enemies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medic soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME enrolled in HIS planetary army as a frontline medic. HECAP soon knew the horrors of war and was deeply marked by them. HECAP left the military and HIS homeworld and began researching medicine and helping those HE came across.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medical scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME enlisted as a doctor on a passing science vessel. Roaming the stars with a large crew of xenohumans and transbirds, HE did genetic research on encountered species. HECAP developed a deep friendship with one transbird but was forced to leave the ship when the captain dismissed all non-avians.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval knight
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME fought for king and country on the battlefield, where HE further honed HIS skill with swords. HISCAP greatest glory was leading a charge into an enemy courtroom and capturing the king at sword point.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mental patient
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was placed in a psychiatric hospital. There, HE spent HIS time engaged in the calming activities of the asylum. HECAP was eventually released, but HE retained HIS emotional distance, HIS curiosity about human anatomy, and HIS namesake manic giggling.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary chef
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Following in HIS family's footsteps, NAME was a soldier for hire. HECAP is a naturally gifted sharpshooter. However, HIS real passion is in perfecting a new recipe or dissecting a new gadget.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary leader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Alone, NAME set out to rebuild HIS father's life's work. HECAP challenged the leader of a small band of mercenaries and took control, then led the band as they hijacked trade ships and stole valuable cargo. HISCAP men mutinied. HECAP was abandoned, arrested, and sentenced to death.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary pilot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME convinced HIS squadron to abscond with their ships and make a course for the rim worlds. There they could fight for the causes they believed in. HISCAP men were loyal and fought hard, but their ideals soon faded away and their cause became that of the highest bidder.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent HIS teenage years as a mercenary, being hired to kill and maim others. HECAP was tall, menacing, and frightening. HECAP could instill fear into the heart of anyone who crossed HIM, and kill anyone HE wanted.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After escaping a crew of rimworld slavers, NAME developed a lack of respect for life. HECAP proceeded to sign on to a mercenary group where HE developed skills using guns and survival techniques. NAME did dirty work where HE found it, and traveled to many worlds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Microbiologist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A plague struck NAME's native urbworld. NAME and other researchers revealed that the illness was a bioweapon, but the people turned on them, blaming them for the sickness. NAME barely escaped HIS homeworld as it fell into chaos.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME worked as an engineer for a colonial military. HECAP got to play with weapons, murder-drones, and other "fun" stuff. HECAP specialized in repairing and modifying mechanoids' tools. Sometimes HE tested them HIMself.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military gunsmith
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Inspired by a particularly evocative piece of propaganda, NAME signed up for the military in hopes of finding glory. To HIS dismay, however, HIS aptitude tests put HIM in the machine shop instead of on the front lines. Later, when HE saw the rows of body bags returning home, HE realized how lucky HE was.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military inventor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME, in a final act of rebellion, left HIS father's lab and joined the local Imperial military. HECAP used HIS laboratory skills to design machines of war. At this HE was one of the best on HIS planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mindwiped assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The corporation took and remade NAME. They trained HIM into an tool of destruction and subversion. HE took to HIS new life, finding satisfaction in the jobs they sent HIM on. When HE learned that they planned on disposing of HIM, NAME turned on HIS masters, killing several and fleeing the planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Minister
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME managed to secure an important position in the government of a minor glitterworld. HECAP got used to the opulence, while attempting to keep HIS citizens content. HECAP had ample time for pleasure and indulgence – though HE never forgot how to do hard work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Missionary
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME decided to devote HIS life to religious service. HE made a vow of peace and spent several years preaching and serving food in soup kitchens for the homeless.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mob enforcer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After being "saved" from HIS home world by a slaver ship, NAME was sold to an urbworld crime lord, where HE was used as an enforcer. HECAP specialized in low-tech beat-downs and intimidation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Ninja assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME performed stiletto-precise assassinations for an interplanetary conglomerate. HECAP was assigned the most complex missions involving disguise, deception, subterfuge, and efficient violence. A nasty incident with a potted plant and an assassination gone wrong left HIM with an aversion to plant life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Orbital reservist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When the government declared that it would strengthen its military defenses, NAME was drafted and trained. HECAP was stationed on an orbital base, manning the defense systems and, in dire situations, descending in a dropship to the surface.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Osteologist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After graduating university at the top of HIS class, NAME quickly became a well-known and athletic college professor. With HIS new found fame and fitness came a sudden reluctance to preform menial labor - such tasks are better left to graduate students.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Overwatch sniper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME didn't know why HE joined the military, but HE stayed to protect HIS fellow soldiers. Army life broke HIM down and built HIM back up. It taught HIM marksmanship, hand to hand combat and how to patch a bullet wound in a hurry.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Paramilitary agent
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After scraping by on assorted shady jobs, NAME joined with a large paramilitary group to fight a war on HIS homeworld. HISCAP role was infiltration and intelligence gathering

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Planetary diplomat
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's passion and profession was interplanetary politics. HE was a master of social manipulation and negotiation and devoted HIMself to working towards peace, compromise and mutual benefit.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Poison gardener
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent almost all HIS time tending to a poison garden and became withdrawn from society. In that time HE learnt a few safe culinary and medicinal uses for the otherwise deadly plants.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Political assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME realized that HIS true calling was in physical solutions to diplomatic problems. HECAP sought training from the assassins guild on Ceti V. HECAP was a quick study at the arts of subterfuge and death. HECAP soon earned the guild rank of Deathjack.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pop idol
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME performed and did interviews constantly. HECAP refined HIS skills in dancing and singing, and became a master of social presentation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Ranger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME lived alone, deep in a forest. HECAP protected the wildlife against poachers, and learned to satisfy HIS own material needs without outside help.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Reporter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent many years as an investigative reporter. HECAP was notorious for making chaotic reports from exotic locations. Although seen as a lightweight by HIS critics, HE managed to break several high-profile stories after lengthy investigations.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Roboticist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Sailors often died on the dangerous waters of NAME's ocean planet. HECAP created robots to replace them. Over time, HE collected a small crew of robots to do HIS bidding. HECAP became proficient at mechanics and engineering, but lost the taste for manual labor.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rocket engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME won a grant to a top school and earned a degree in rocket engineering. After several years working for a space mining company HE left to travel and see the universe.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rugby player
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After years of addiction to virtual reality games, NAME was saved when the doctors unplugged HIM. Unfortunately, they unplugged HIM during a match of Rugby Rampage 4. The mental backlash merged HIS real identity and HIS virtual identity, leaving HIM with the personality and skills of a rugby player.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sanitation captain
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After graduating officer training school, NAME was assigned to main battle deck on the Thunder-Child. HECAP served there for a year before HIS "gallant" actions saw HIM reassigned to the maintenance corps. It was with the maintenance corps HE was dubbed Table on account of HIS legs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Serial murderer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME started to enjoy killing people, so HE did more often and perfected HIS methods. HECAP lurked in the darkest streets, stalking prey for hours. HECAP enjoyed making artworks of HIS victims, and was known for leaving HIS signature on the bodies of those HE killed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Slave chemist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME became a gifted pharmaceutical scientist, but was captured by slavers. HECAP was sold to a warlord and forced to create drugs to test on other slaves. This left HIM with deep and troubling questions on the ethics of scientific research and medicine.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Smuggler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a contract pilot, NAME had a knack for stealing goods and trafficking contraband without getting caught. HECAP eventually saved up enough to buy HIS own ship, and used it to travel from world to world dealing HIS goods in person.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sole survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME lived in a remote colony. When mechanoid centipedes attacked HIS home and killed HIS people, HE was the last survivor.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space humanitarian
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After seeing the rampant poverty common on overcrowded urban worlds, NAME decided to dedicate HIS life to helping the less fortunate. This crusade taught HIM how to care for the sick and the hungry.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Now a proficient hunter and marksman, NAME yearned for more. HECAP took leave from HIS birth world, traveling the great expanse in search of exotic game.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space marine
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was recruited into the security forces of an off-planet corporation. HECAP defended their ships against pirates and engaged in private space warfare contracts.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space marine
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME joined a squad of space marines known for their brutal efficiency at killing. HISCAP last name and HIS lack of emotion during combat inspired HIS nickname: Grim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space navy doctor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME served several tours as a doctor on one of the few warships defending HIS homeworld. HECAP learned combat skills while fighting occasional pirate boarding parties, and became an expert at treating gruesome combat wounds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME inherited HIS parents' ship and carried on their research. HISCAP childhood experiences with diverse cultures allowed HIM to preserve HIS caring nature despite spending most of HIS life isolated in space.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space station cook
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The space station NAME came from was far from any populated planets, and was in itself understaffed. For this reason, NAME was forced to learn how to cook in order to keep the crew alive. While HE appreciated this learning opportunity, HE didn't appreciate the criticism which came with it, and has had self-esteem issues ever since.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space technician
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME finally managed to flee HIS criminal life by getting a maintenance job on a nearby space station. HECAP performed multiple repairing and building operations. HECAP also used to participate in basic research activities and often defused co-workers' arguments. HECAP never liked doing art.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Spaceship chef
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME got a spot on a ship by becoming the ship's cook. HECAP enjoyed cooking and helping the doctor clean wounds, but HE never got used to cleaning the dishes.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Spaceship salesperson
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME tried HIS hand at various jobs, including building space rabbit cages and working at a mutant wheat research project. Finally, HE found HIS true calling as a spacecraft salesperson. Specializing in recreational spacecraft, HIS smooth talk and charming nature served HIM well.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Special forces
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Give me a reason to kill - a good reason! NAME was a soldier and a skilled one - so skilled that HE entered the special forces to battle militants and xenohuman raiders. HECAP never imagined HIMself a lone hero, but HE played HIS part in the group well.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Spiceminer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME made HIS mark on the universe as a spice miner assigned to the lucrative mining colony of Rural Pen'The. Little did HE know, Benn was about to embark on a career path that would change HIS life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Spy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was trained by HIS government in infiltration and espionage. HECAP learned to keep a cool head and to talk HIS way out of tight situations. When talking didn't work, HE was capable of more violent direct action.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Stalwart farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With the farm under constant threat from brigands, NAME learned to defend HIMself with HIS father's hunting rifle. HECAP also mastered how to construct fences to keep livestock in and the local wildlife out. NAME tried to paint a picture of HIS home and learned HE can only draw scribbles and ducks.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Stalwart farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With the farm under constant threat from brigands, NAME learned to defend HIMself with HIS father's rifle. HECAP also mastered how to construct walls to keep livestock in and predators out. HECAP once tried to paint a picture of HIS home, but discovered that HE could only draw scribbles and ducks.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Star knight
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abducted from HIS medieval homeworld, NAME later escaped HIS captors via an impressive display of swordsmanship. For a moment, as HE drifted in the escape pod, HIS childhood dream of becoming a knight among the stars felt so real. Then HE crash-landed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Starship doctor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a doctor on a starship. HECAP was a brilliant surgeon and dabbled in research of HIS own. However, HE was quite reclusive and never had the best bedside manner.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Station security
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was commissioned as a special constable on a network of space stations. There HE prevented illegal human trafficking. Once, fire broke out on the station, and HE saved many from the flames. Since then, HE has avoided fires.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Stiletto assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Because of HIS skills, NAME developed a sense of superiority. In time, HE lost HIS sense of empathy. HECAP often got into fights, and discovered how easy it is to kill a person. After realizing HIS talents, HE became one of the most efficient assassins in the system.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Storyteller
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME traveled HIS world recounting the legends that HE had studied. Obsessed with the legends of HIS people, NAME seeks someone who can help HIM grow scales on HIS skin, so HE too can be as the ancients were.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Technology doctor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME performed research into propulsive fuels and energy generation. HECAP loved technology research, and hoped to improve human life by doing it.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Test subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Kidnapped as a teenager, NAME was an unwilling test subject in experimental gene therapies for six years. Labs and scientists scare HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Test subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's tests went from geometry to quantum physics, and HE could run the grand gauntlet without a scratch. One day, Mother said that HIS final test lay beyond the red door, and that even if HE couldn't hear her voice, Mother would always be there.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Undertaker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME roamed the galaxy offering grief assistance to those who've had a recent loss. While HE never shied away from physical confrontation, HE prefers to confront tough situations with a calm word.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Unstable butcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME began hearing voices. The animals were talking to HIM, insulting HIM. HECAP came to hate them, and eventually killed HIS furry former friends. HECAP started selling the meat just to get human interaction.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld politician
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: It's no secret that the Companies own much of the urbworlds, but someone has to take the bribes. NAME was one such figurehead. HECAP learned how to manipulate the hopes and dreams of the people while living comfortably in a penthouse.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld sergeant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's passion for all things militaristic kept with HIM all the way to adulthood. After enrolling as a local police officer, HE was soon promoted to sergeant.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld sex slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was sold into sexual slavery. Having been designed to be inhumanly attractive and too weak to rebel against HIS masters, HE was passed between dozens of owners and knew nothing of freedom.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Versatile worker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Spending HIS later teenage years in a colony of settlers, HE offered what little skills HE had to anyone who would take HIM. Being a quick learner, HE honed many of HIS skills and, apart from HIS crippling inability to understand fire, is now a fully functioning adult.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Veteran soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME fought many tours against pirates, rebels, and xenos. HECAP endured the glory and horrors of war. Worn down by drills, wars, and battle scars, NAME "retired" to the easy soldier life of colonial civility enforcement. HECAP spent HIS days polishing HIS war medals, knowing HE had done HIS bloodline proud.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Villain
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After rising to the top of HIS criminal band, NAME was taught the arts of villainy, from handling firearms to developing new weapons technologies. HECAP excelled at bending others to HIS will.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wandering healer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME studied to be a doctor, but was dissatisfied with HIS practice on an otherwise peaceful midworld. Instead, HE chose to pull up roots and travel to the rimworlds in order to care for people who needed HIM most.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: War chief
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a tribal gang leader on a neolithic planet. For HIM, the battlefield is a game, and there is nothing more fun than the fires of war.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland ruffian
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Survival was a day-to-day struggle. Food usually consisted of half-decomposed animals, and water had to be condensed from the air. To survive, NAME became resourceful. A surveyor from the Ordo Historia happened across NAME's world and rescued HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: White-hat hacker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From HIS computer, NAME helped rid the online world of bad people.
